sourcesContent:
import { Component, Input, Output, EventEmitter } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-post-confirmation-modal', templateUrl: './post-confirmation-modal.component.html', styleUrls: ['./post-confirmation-modal.component.css'] }) export class PostConfirmationModalComponent { @Input() isOpen = true; @Output() submitClicked = new EventEmitter(); menuSelected = ''; onMenuButtonClicked(menu: string) { this.menuSelected = menu; console.log(this.menuSelected); } onSubmitClicked() { this.submitClicked.emit(); } close() { this.isOpen = false; } }
close
